Sentencas: La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-delta (LSF64) thin films are prepared by pulsed laser deposition (PLD) on yttria stabilized zirconia single crystals (YSZ) and characterized by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) measurements before and after decoration with platinum nanoparticles.
Titulo: Outstanding Oxygen Reduction Kinetics of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δSurfaces Decorated with Platinum Nanoparticles

Sentencas: The platinum on the surface of LSF64 strongly accelerates the oxygen surface exchange kinetics.
Titulo: Outstanding Oxygen Reduction Kinetics of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δSurfaces Decorated with Platinum Nanoparticles

Sentencas: Especially at low oxygen partial pressures, the area-specific resistance (ASR) decreases by almost two orders of magnitude (e.g. in 0.25 mbar pO(2)from 125 omega cm(2)to ca.
Titulo: Outstanding Oxygen Reduction Kinetics of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δSurfaces Decorated with Platinum Nanoparticles
Outstanding Oxygen Reduction Kinetics of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δSurfaces Decorated with Platinum Nanoparticles

Sentencas: While the pure LSF64 films exhibit severe degradation of the polarization resistance, Pt decorated films degrade much slower and show less scatter between individual samples.
Titulo: Outstanding Oxygen Reduction Kinetics of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δSurfaces Decorated with Platinum Nanoparticles

Sentencas: Surprisingly, faster oxygen incorporation (=lower polarization resistance) results for lower oxygen partial pressures, which indicates a severe mechanism change compared to undecorated LSF64 surfaces.
Titulo: Outstanding Oxygen Reduction Kinetics of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δSurfaces Decorated with Platinum Nanoparticles

Sentencas: The obtained results thus also reveal valuable information on the rate-determining step of oxygen exchange on LSF64 surfaces with and without platinum.
Titulo: Outstanding Oxygen Reduction Kinetics of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δSurfaces Decorated with Platinum Nanoparticles

Sentencas: On undecorated LSF64 surfaces oxygen dissociation is suggested to be rate limiting, while the Pt particles on LSF64 enable fast oxygen dissociation.
Titulo: Outstanding Oxygen Reduction Kinetics of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δSurfaces Decorated with Platinum Nanoparticles

Sentencas: Consequently, on Pt-decorated LSF64 electrodes a kind of job sharing mechanism results, with oxygen dissociation taking place on Pt and oxide ion formation and incorporation proceeding on the oxide.
Titulo: Outstanding Oxygen Reduction Kinetics of La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-δSurfaces Decorated with Platinum Nanoparticles
